law.catch_line: Legality of items described in KRS 227.702.

text.section: Items described in KRS 227.702 are legal for retail sale provided all applicable federal and state requirements with respect thereto are met.

Items described in KRS 227.706 are not legal for retail sale but are legal under permits granted pursuant to KRS 227.710 for the purposes specified in this chapter for public displays and may be sold at wholesale as provided in this chapter.
Items described in KRS 227.704 are legal for retail sale provided all applicable federal and state requirements with respect thereto are met.

law.history: Amended 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 66, sec. 9, effective March 16, 2011. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 436, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1982.
